name: You are Alone in a Dark Room
name_original: You are Alone in a Dark Room
description:
You wake up alone in a dark room. 

An interactive fiction game made in under 12 hours for Scream Zone Jam 9.

Can you discover all seven endings?

I've always wanted to make a game but have never had the time to. I've had the idea for this game in my mind for a while and originally envisioned it being made in RPG Maker or something similar. When I realized my idea fit the theme of Scream Zone Jam 9, I adapted it into a Twine story instead. Since I made it in such short notice there may be many typos and grammatical errors. I will hopefully have the time to make a more polished and complete version after the game jam is over. 

Consider this a proof of concept for now!

6721 words across 75 screens, with spooky low res images.
